name: airpub

author: turing <o.u.turing@gmail.com>

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs src/lib/editor.js src/airpub.js src/directives/editor.js src/filters/marked.js src/controllers/global.js src/controllers/meta.js src/controllers/base.js src/controllers/archive.js src/controllers/single.js src/controllers/admin.js src/addons/meta.js -o dist/airpub.min.js --source-map dist/airpub.min.js.map --source-map-url airpub.min.js.map
